security_audit.summary: This skill is a legitimate content generation tool. Static findings are false positives: the scanner misinterprets JavaScript template literals (backticks) as shell command execution. All network/filesystem operations are intentional and necessary for content workflow.

low_findings.reasoning: Legitimate data source for trending topics

content.user_title: Generate Viral Content from Trending Topics
content.value_statement: Finding trending topics that resonate with audiences is time-consuming. This skill automates discovery from TopHub and generates engagement-focused content using the proven Defou x Stanley viral writing framework.
actual_capabilities: Fetch real-time trending topics from TopHub hot list
Use AI to select top 10 high-potential topics for viral content
Generate three content versions: Stanley style, Defou style, and Combo style
Create engagement-focused hooks and scoring for each piece
Save all generated content as formatted Markdown files
limitations: Only processes Chinese-language trending topics from TopHub
Requires valid Anthropic API key for AI content generation
Output style is specific to the Defou x Stanley contrarian framework
Content is generated in batches, not interactive

Use MOCK_MODE=true for testing the workflow without consuming API credits

Do not ignore the .env file setup - the skill requires ANTHROPIC_API_KEY

faq.question: What data source does this skill use?
faq.answer: It fetches trending topics from TopHub (tophub.today), a Chinese hot list aggregator.

faq.question: Do I need an Anthropic API key?
faq.answer: Yes, set ANTHROPIC_API_KEY in your .env file. Without it, the skill runs in mock mode.

faq.question: How many topics are selected?
faq.answer: The skill fetches top 150 items, then AI selects the best 10 for viral content potential.

faq.question: What content styles are generated?
faq.answer: Three versions: Stanley style (viral), Defou style (deep insight), and Combo style (best of both).

faq.question: Where are files saved?
faq.answer: Output files go to outputs/defou-stanley-posts/ directory as Markdown files.

faq.question: Can I customize the output format?
faq.answer: Yes, modify the generateContent function prompts to change structure or style.
